thread.title: Prince William mocked at BAFTAs for being related to Danny Dyer leaving him 'devastated'
thread.title_full: Prince William mocked at BAFTAs for being related to Danny Dyer leaving him 'devastated'

title: Prince William mocked at BAFTAs for being related to Danny Dyer leaving him 'devastated'
text:
Prince William mocked at BAFTAs for being related to Danny Dyer leaving him 'devastated' Prince William mocked at BAFTAs for being related to Danny Dyer leaving him 'devastated' STEPHEN Fry was clearly in a brave mood as he hosted the BAFTA Awards tonight. / Published 12th February 2017 
The host decided to mock Prince William as he opened the 70th annual British Academy of Film & Television Arts Awards. 
Prince William had just taken his seat next to the Duchess of Cambridge to a standing ovation, when Fry began his speech. 
The host quickly made a joke, saying it was lucky that Kate Middleton was there to provide comfort to her husband. 
BBC ONE DUKE AND DUTCHESS OF CAMBRIDGE: Kate Middleton & Prince William attended BAFTAs BAFTAs 2017: The sexiest red carpet looks Sunday, 12th February 2017 BAFTAs 2017: The sexiest red carpet looks from this year's award show. 1 / 19 The sexiest looks at the BAFTAs 
Why? 
Stephen quipped: "He is still recovering from devastating news he is related to Danny Dyer." 
Of course, the audience – and the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge – all began to laugh at the quick joke. 
BBC ONE STEPHEN FRY: Hosted the 70th Annual BAFTA Awards BAFTAs 2017: Best and worst dressed Sunday, 12th February 2017 BAFTAs 2017: The best and worst dressed from star-studded red carpet at the Royal Albert Hall. 1 / 45
